hero.title: AI Image Animation Generator
hero.subtitle: Transform static images into dynamic animated videos with AI-powered technology

whatIs.title: What is Image Animation?
whatIs.description: Image Animation is an AI-powered technology that transforms static images into dynamic, lifelike videos. Our advanced AI analyzes your photos, artwork, and illustrations to create natural movements, breathing effects, and subtle animations that bring your images to life with captivating motion.

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Select and upload the photo, artwork, or illustration you want to animate

steps.title: Describe the Animation
steps.content: Write a prompt describing the type of movement you want to see in your image

steps.title: Choose Settings
steps.content: Select animation duration, style, and quality preferences for your video

steps.title: Generate & Download
steps.content: Let AI create your animated video and download the result in high quality

benefits.title: Why Use Our Image Animation Generator?
benefits.description: Create professional animated content from static images without complex software or animation skills

features.title: AI-Powered Animation
features.content: Advanced AI technology creates natural, lifelike movements from any static image

features.title: Multiple Image Types
features.content: Works with photos, digital art, illustrations, portraits, and various image formats

features.title: Natural Movement
features.content: Generate realistic breathing, blinking, hair movement, and subtle facial animations

features.title: High Quality Output
features.content: Create smooth, professional-quality animated videos up to 1080p resolution

features.title: Easy to Use
features.content: Simple upload and generate process - no animation experience required

features.title: Fast Processing
features.content: Transform your images into animations in minutes, not hours

faq.title: Image Animation Generator FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about creating animations from static images
faq.q1: What types of images work best for animation?
faq.a1: High-quality images with clear subjects work best. Photos, digital art, portraits, and illustrations all produce excellent results when they have good resolution and distinct features.
faq.q2: How long can the animated videos be?
faq.a2: You can create animations ranging from 5 to 10 seconds long, which is perfect for social media content, presentations, and engaging visual displays.
faq.q3: What animation effects can I create?
faq.a3: Our AI can generate various effects including breathing animations, eye blinking, hair movement, facial expressions, and environmental effects like flowing water or moving clouds.
faq.a4: We support common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WEBP files up to 10MB in size for optimal processing and animation quality.
faq.q5: How realistic do the animations look?
faq.a5: Our AI creates natural-looking animations that enhance your images without making them look artificial. The movements are subtle and lifelike.
faq.q6: Can I control the animation style?
faq.a6: Yes, you can specify the type of animation you want through detailed prompts, choosing from realistic movements, artistic effects, or stylized animations.
